options.text: You want me to throw together a basic framework for your game so you can get started right away?
Would you like to take the opportunity to learn some Python together first?

gamePath.speaker: Pixel
gamePath.text: Great, we've got ourselves a game cooking here! But it needs a direction. What are you thinking? I can do a few!

workStyle.speaker: Pixel
workStyle.text: Awesome! Love it! Hey I'm just here to help, how do you like to work?

gameType.platformer: Alright, great! What do you think for a title screen? Got these great assets that work perfect in a platformer!
gameType.rpg: Awesome! Okay hey, in an RPG you know what you need? A character selection screen! Let's design that first!
gameType.dungeon: Perfect choice! Dungeon crawlers need that spooky atmosphere. Let's start with your dungeon entrance!
gameType.racing: Speed demon! I like it! Every racing game needs a cool car selection screen. Let's build that first!
gameType.puzzle: Brain teasers! Nice! Let's design your main menu where players can choose levels!
gameType.adventure: Adventure awaits! These games are all about the story. Let's create your opening scene!
gameType.default: Interesting choice! Let's start with the basics - your main menu!

learnPath.speaker: Pixel
learnPath.text: Perfect! Learning Python is the best way to really understand game development. Let me show you our lessons!

assetSelected.speaker: Pixel
assetSelected.text: Great choice! Now let's add some interactivity. What should happen when the player starts?

gameType.platformer: In platformers, movement is everything! Let's set up jumping and running mechanics!
gameType.rpg: RPG controls are about exploration and interaction. Let's configure your character movement!
gameType.racing: Racing is all about speed and precision! Let's tune your vehicle controls!
gameType.default: Let's get your controls set up so you can interact with the game!

worldSetup.speaker: Pixel
worldSetup.text: Time to build your game world! This is where the magic happens!

gameType.platformer: Platformers need great level design with platforms, obstacles, and collectibles!
gameType.rpg: RPG worlds are vast and full of stories. Let's create your first area!

gameRules.speaker: Pixel
gameRules.text: Every game needs rules! Let's define how players win, lose, and progress!
